desc: Owned and operated by former dancers, Saratoga Dance has been serving students and professionals for over 30 years. We specialize in the art of precision pointe shoe fitting and carry only quality products from top manufacturers- Ballet, Tap, Jazz, Lyrical and more!

layout.text: We are the pointe shoe and dancewear experts! Our store is a full service dance shop and we've been a part of our local dance community for over 30 years. Thank you for all of your support and happy dancing!
